TopicTitle: I need my username changed, please!

Articles.Content:
When I made my account back in May 2013, I chose the username Sun, because I wanted to be portrayed as a celestial body, since I was more into space than I am now. (I'm still interested in space, don't worry!) Now, I realize that my username should more fit what my forum personality is. So, if possible, I would like my username to be changed to MrMuddyBoots, please. I would feel more comfortable with the name, and people would recognize my personality on the forums almost instantly.

Thanks, Sun (possibly soon known as MrMuddyBoots).
Judging by your user title, your avatar, and your signature, I think it's pretty clear that you're into Mud. Whatever rocks your boat, though.
It would be best to PM Rowsdower, or perhaps KasperVld, about this. Do note, however, that once it is changed, further name change requests will be refused.

It would be best to PM Rowsdower, or perhaps KasperVld, about this. Do note, however, that once it is changed, further name change requests will be refused.

Is that like one change per user, or one change per universe?

Is that like one change per user, or one change per universe?

both

One per user per universe.
